item.title: Recent Reading: Kalayna Price

item.description: • Grave Witch, an Alex Craft novel, by Kalayna Price.

item.title: Recent Reading: Patricia Briggs
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• Wolfsbane by Patricia Briggs, copyright 2010 by Hurog, Inc.; ISBN: 978-0-441-01954-0.

    The previously unpublished sequel to her 1983 debut novel, Masques.

item.title: Recent Reading: Mike Shevdon
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description: • Sixty-one Nails, The Courts of the Feyre, vol 1, by Mike Shevdon.

item.title: Recent Reading: Bernard Cornwell
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• Agincourt, by Bernard Cornwell, copyright 2009; Harper/HarperCollinsPublisher; ISBN: 978p0-06-157891-5.

    Books mentioned in the historical note:

    • The Face of Battle, by John Keegan

    • Agincourt: A New History, by Anne Curry

    • Agincourt, by Juliet Barker

    • Longbow: A Social and Military History, by Robert Hardy

    The bows used at Agincourt were 130 to 140 pounds pull.

item.description: • The Spirit Ring, by Lois McMaster Bujold.

item.description: • The Dark World, by Henry Kuttner; copyright 1946 by Ace Books, renewed 1974 by Catherine Kuttner Reggie; Planet Stories/Paizo Publishing, LLC; First Printing November, 2008; ISBN: 978-1-60125-136-7.

item.title: Recent Reading: Amanda Downum
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• The Bone Palace, by Amanda Downum, copyright 2010; ISBN: 978-0-316-06900-7.

    Book 2 of The Necromancer Chronicles, a sequel to The Drowning City.

item.title: Recent Reading: Richard Kadrey
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• Sandman Slim, by Richard Kadrey, ©2009; ISBN: 978-0-06-197626-1.

    I'll have to look for the next.

item.title: Recent Reading: Patricia Briggs
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• Masques, by Patricia Briggs; ©1993 by Patricia Briggs, ©2010 by Hurog, Inc.; ISBN: 978-0-441-01942-7.

    This was Briggs' first published novel, and this edition lightly updates in preparation for the upcoming sequel, Wolfsbane.

item.title: Recent Reading: Lilith Saintcrow
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• Heaven's Spite, by Lilith Saintcrow, ©2010; ISBN: 978-0-316-07417-0.

    The fifth Jill Kismet novel.
